statements: DELETE FROM insured_properties WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM insured_properties WHERE value > 100000 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM insured_properties WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%fire%' OR coverage_details LIKE '%theft%';
DELETE FROM insured_properties WHERE property_id = 100 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM coverage_types WHERE coverage_id = 5 AND type_name = 'Fire'
DELETE FROM property_insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount < 5000.00 AND end_date < NOW();

DELETE FROM insured_properties WHERE location = 'New York' AND value > 500000
